title: Question:
author: ChiBitCTy
content: Contestants Gallery of the Contest 21) tjtonmoy2) dark12343) MoparMiningLLC4) Deviljr5) Johnyz6) onecall1237) halim50_8 ) Tanvi50_9) Sarah Azhari10) Inwestour11) Dr.Bitcoin_Strang12) Jatiluhung13) Cantsay14) crypto sufixe15) fadhilz12316) Eye$17) RiadRifat327⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[/center][/quote](A massive thank you to rat03gopoh & shahzadafzal for compiling these photos)Voting begins now for Contest #2.  There will be one full week of voting, as I want to give everyone a chance to get their votes in.How the Poll is to be RunPoll will run for 7 days.  1 vote per user (you are NOT allowed to use your alt account to vote twice). You can change your vote, of course only up until the contest ends.  IMPORTANT NOTES:Once the 7 days is up, the voting will end, but the final results will possibly not be the actual tallies/winners until Theymos comes in and implements a few things to make the voting more fair.  Those things are, as stated by Theymos..“ 1) only Member+ votes will count, where copper membership does not on its own count as Member; and 2) users who haven't made a post in the year between the time of this post and 1 year ago will not be counted".In the unlikely case of a tie, we'll run another poll which will be set to run for 3 days.No manipulation of any kind allowed. If I see you trying to manipulate the votes in any way, I reserve the right to disqualify you. Please no alt-accounts, no begging for votes etc.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: My vote’s done  Congrats to all the contestants and good luck all And well done again ChiBitCTy for organising it all

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: There are contestants in this particular contest whom are private messaging members who they don't even know trying to get them to vote for their work.  I specifically said no manipulating of votes in any way, no begging for votes etc.  I believe I'm going to disqualify this person but not sure if that's the exact course of action to take. What I can/will say for right now, STOP IT.  Do not randomly bug people to vote for you.  It's against the rules of the contest as well as against forum rules.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: ^^In general contests, proven rule violators will be disqualified and that's normal. In this case, the contest organizer has full authority and no one'll interfere. But whatever your final decision, I personally respect that. Talent isn't really needed, obeying the rules is mandatory.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on November 09, 2022, 01:12:40 AMThere are contestants in this particular contest whom are private messaging members who they don't even know trying to get them to vote for their work.  I specifically said no manipulating of votes in any way, no begging for votes etc.  I believe I'm going to disqualify this person but not sure if that's the exact course of action to take. What I can/will say for right now, STOP IT.  Do not randomly bug people to vote for you.  It's against the rules of the contest as well as against forum rules.  If such User is among the Top 5 most voted then you can proceed with the cancellation but if they are not then there is no need for you to waste you time removing them. After all this is the first time a pumpkin contest has ever been held in this forum though the turn up were amazing  but we hope the next one will be better.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Little bit of time left to get in your vote if you have not already! Keep in mind once the voting closes the votes will not necessarily reflect our exact winners until Theymos goes in and implements these two things “  1) only Member+ votes will count, where copper membership does not on its own count as Member; and 2) users who haven't made a post in the year between the time of this post and 1 year ago will not be counted”.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on November 11, 2022, 06:06:32 PMI just wanted to thank everyone again for such a great turn out for year 1 of this contest. It far exceeded my expectations, to say the least! I’ve reached out to Theymos so he can put the finishing touches on the results, so stayed tuned for the winners to be revealed!  (Please note moving day comes for me tomorrow (lucky me lol), so my communication may be limited over the next couple of days)

comments.author: theymos
comments.body: I adjusted the results to remove votes that shouldn't count:Quote from: ChiBitCTy on November 03, 2022, 03:18:51 AM1) only Member+ votes will count, where copper membership does not on its own count as Member; and 2) users who haven't made a post in the year between the time of this post and 1 year ago will not be counted". After adjustment, the results are:Code:+-------------------+---------------+| user              | adjustedVotes |+-------------------+---------------+| fadhilz123        |            21 || Sarah Azhari      |            19 || dark1234          |            11 || MoparMinningLLC   |             7 || johnyz            |             6 || Deviljr           |             6 || crypto sufixe     |             4 || Jatiluhung        |             3 || tjtonmoy          |             2 || halim50_          |             2 || oncecall123       |             1 || Cantsay           |             1 || Dr.Bitcoin_Strang |             1 |+-------------------+---------------+

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Congrats to fadhilz123 on your win in this competition!  Thanks again to everyone who participated! (@fadhilz123 please shoot me your information so I can ship the coin out to you).

comments.author: dark1234
comments.body: Congrats Fadhilz123,Previously I did not know if the purchased works can also be considered valid for this contest. In the next contest I'll be buying something as well instead of creating my own. LOL

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: if he bought it, I would think that would be a disqualification

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 13, 2022, 01:21:14 PMif he bought it, I would think that would be a disqualificationIn the description of his work, yes it was bought.Quote from: fadhilz123 on October 31, 2022, 12:20:54 PMHello everyone, this is a cake order from my wife in a shop because she herself can't make a cake like this, but she tried to order it for me. Thank you my wifeI agree with you @MoparMiningLLC, just can't imagine the badge awarding (if any) is based on self-made purchased work.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: Munnig on December 27, 2022, 09:21:43 AMCongratulations @Sarah Azhari & @fadhilz123I don't won
